name: Dream (itch) (Rose's Lion)
description:
If you're:

  • a late bloomer
  • starting over
  • having a lot of nightmares lately
  • seeking to combine your dreams with mazes and collectible-hunting

this might be your thing.

Music, words, graphics by Rose's Lion.

Helped along incredibly by Sean LeBlanc + @AYolland's Borksy.

Dedicated to everyone who's helped me wake up.
